meanings.definition: The act of designing or planning something.
meanings.sent1: Her designments for the new house were meticulous and thoughtful.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the designments for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: His designments for the surprise party were so detailed that nothing could go wrong.
meanings.sent4: The designments of the garden layout were like a beautiful painting coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The architect's designments transformed the old building into a modern masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A specific plan or intention for something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher shared her designments for the class field trip.
meanings.sent2: His designments for the weekend getaway were exciting.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's designments to steal the birdseed were foiled by a clever trap.
meanings.sent4: Her designments to excel in the competition were evident in her focused training.
meanings.sent5: The chef's designments for the new menu delighted the restaurant patrons.

meanings.definition: The result of a design or plan.
meanings.sent1: The designments of the bridge were sturdy and reliable.
meanings.sent2: The garden was the beautiful designments of the landscape architect.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain ruined all our designments for the outdoor party.
meanings.sent4: The designments of the city skyline at night were breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designments of the dress made it a showstopper at the fashion show.
